insa.h4401.controller

Class UIManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • insa.h4401.controller.UIManager

  • public class UIManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This controller manages all the view and is notified when something happens on the view. It implements the sigleton design pattern and only one instance should exist when the application is running. Should always be used as following UIManager.getInstance(). ...
    Author:
    Lisa, Estelle, Antoine, Pierre, Hugues, Guillaume, Paul

        Returns:
